Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (args.Length != 2) {  	log.Error ("Must supply 2 command line arguments");  }  else {  	int left = int.Parse (args [0]);  	int right = int.Parse (args [1]);  	int result = 0;  	if (log.IsDebugEnabled)  		log.Debug ("Adding [" + left + "] to [" + right + "]");  	result = (new SimpleModule.Math ()).Add (left' right);  	if (log.IsDebugEnabled)  		log.Debug ("Result [" + result + "]");  	Console.Out.WriteLine (result);  	if (log.IsDebugEnabled)  		log.Debug ("Subtracting [" + right + "] from [" + left + "]");  	result = (new SharedModule.Math ()).Subtract (left' right);  	if (log.IsDebugEnabled)  		log.Debug ("Result [" + result + "]");  	Console.Out.WriteLine (result);  }
